snippet.title: Tomb Raider: Anniversary™ – Launch trailer
snippet.description:
To understand your present, you have to go back to your past.

A decade after Lara Croft’s first archaeological escapade in the celebrated Tomb Raider, that enthralling adventure was re-imagined for a new audience.

For news, updates and information, follow us on Twitter...
https://twitter.com/feralgames
...and like us on Facebook...
https://www.facebook.com/feralinteractive
